content: Back in NYC and the vibe is unreal. The subways got that special hum, y'know? Time to jump back into the grind and start fresh after that job setback.
raw_content: Back in NYC, the city's energy is electric. There's something about the hum of the subways that feels like home. Time to dive back into the hustle and start fresh after that job loss.

content: Just hit 22, and looking back, I've grown so much. Even the setbacks have made me stronger. Now I'm ready to use that experience to snag a job at a top quant firm.
raw_content: Just turned 22. Reflecting on the past year, I realize how much I've grown, even through setbacks. Time to leverage that growth into securing a position at a leading quant firm.
